title: Chemistry MOOC Digital Content Modules: Mobile Microlearning Based on Collaborative Learning and Connectivism

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and basic smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Teaching Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service or In-Service Teachers. Provides a Collaborative Learning Environment for Systematic Acquisition of Basic Chemistry Concepts in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain core chemistry concepts (atomic structure, chemical bonding, etc.) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners enhance their ability to solve chemistry problems through discussion and collaboration with peers on mobile platforms.
Learners can analyze and interpret chemical reaction simulation results through interactive activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
